alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 5:43PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 6500 feet. The heaviest snow will fall between 10 PM and 2 AM MST when snowfall rates of 1-3 inches per hour are likely. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow will cause near white-out conditions during the heaviest snowfall. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause wind damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Additional snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Wednesday: Jacob Lake 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
